plugins.name: Console CLI
plugins.description:
Console CLI lets you control Figma using commands. You can list fonts, styles, and components, create shapes, get details about selected elements, check file analytics, and view user info.


Commands:

  1. help : See available commands
  2. ls : Lists data related to fonts, styles, or components
  3. ls fonts : List all fonts used in the file
  4. ls styles : List all styles used in file file
  5. ls components : List all components in the file
  6. shape : Create a new shapes based on the specified type
  7. shape rect <width> <height> [x] [y] : Create rectangle
  8. shape circle <diameter> [x] [y] : Create circle
  9. shape ellipse <width> <height> [x] [y] : Create ellipse
  10. shape polygon <sides> <radius> [x] [y] : Create polygon
  11. shape star <points> <outer-radius> <inner-radius> [x] [y] : Create star
  12. selection : Info about the currently selected nodes
  13. selection --verbose : Additional details about the selection
  14. analytics : Retrieve file analytics
  15. whoami : Retrieves info about the current user
  16. clear : Clear the console
  17. exit : Close the plugin
plugins.tagline: CLI for Figma. List elements, create shapes, get selection info, and check file analytics.

127623.tagline: CLI for Figma. List elements, create shapes, get selection info, and check file analytics.

plugins.name: Your AI Co-Pilot
plugins.description:
Your AI Co-Pilot provides instant design feedback directly within Figma. Select any design elements to receive AI-powered analysis across four key areas:


• UI Design: Visual hierarchy, color usage, spacing, and consistency

• Content: Readability, clarity, and copy suggestions

• User Experience: Usability issues and interaction patterns

• Accessibility: WCAG compliance recommendations


The plugin analyzes selected frames, components, or groups and generates actionable feedback to improve your designs. You can ask follow-up questions to get more detailed explanations or recommendations.


All analysis is performed securely through our backend API using advanced AI models. No design data is stored permanently - it's only processed temporarily during analysis.
plugins.tagline: Instant AI feedback on your designs

All analysis is performed securely through our backend API using advanced AI models. No design data is stored permanently - it's only processed temporarily during analysis.

129161.tagline: Instant AI feedback on your designs

plugins.name: Text Changer
plugins.description: Magic Text Replace is a Figma plugin designed to streamline text editing workflows. It allows users to find and replace text across selected layers or the entire document, with options for case sensitivity, whole-word matching, and regular expressions. The plugin also keeps a history of replacements for easy reapplication and provides a preview of text layers for better control.
plugins.tagline: find and replace text in Figma with advanced options like case sensitivity, regex, and more.

124704.name: Text Changer
124704.description: Magic Text Replace is a Figma plugin designed to streamline text editing workflows. It allows users to find and replace text across selected layers or the entire document, with options for case sensitivity, whole-word matching, and regular expressions. The plugin also keeps a history of replacements for easy reapplication and provides a preview of text layers for better control.
124704.tagline: find and replace text in Figma with advanced options like case sensitivity, regex, and more.

plugins.name: Convert To Bionic Writing
plugins.description:
Unlock Faster, More Focused Reading with Bionic Reading: This plugin applies the Bionic Reading method (bionic-reading.com) to your text layers, dynamically bolding the initial letters of words to improve reading speed and comprehension. By leveraging the natural fixation points of the eye, Bionic Reading helps readers process text more efficiently with less cognitive effort. This plugin works best with fonts that offer multiple weight variations.


Key Features:


  1. Converts selected text layers to Bionic Reading format.
  2. Optimizes text for faster and more focused reading.
  3. Ideal for improving readability and engagement.



Open Source: github.com/mrayubmuhammad/Convert-To-Bionic-Writing-Figma-Plugin



Created by d3flow (www.d3flow.com) using Claude.ai.

Note: Requires fonts with multiple weight options for optimal performance.

accepted.name: Ayub Muhammad
accepted.description: Cofounder at d3flow where we Design, Develop and Distribute in flow.

accepted.name: d3flow
accepted.description: Design, Develop, Distribute in flow with d3flow

plugins.tagline: Focused Reading, Better Typography

plugins.name: Frame to JSON - AI-powered Design-to-Code Converter
plugins.description:
🎯 What is it?

A powerful Figma plugin that transforms your design frames into structured JSON data, ensuring seamless developer handoff and design-to-code consistency.


✨ Key Features

•AI-powered frame analysis

•One-click frame-to-JSON conversion

•Complete hierarchy and style preservation

•Customizable export options

•Developer-friendly structured output


🚀 How to Use

1.Select your target frame(s) in Figma

2.Launch the Frame to JSON plugin

3.Review the extracted structure and properties

4.Click “Generate JSON”

5.Copy or download the JSON output instantly


🛠️ What You’ll Need

•Figma design frames


🔒 Security Note

Your data is processed securely, with no external storage. The plugin ensures precise design-to-code conversion while maintaining full control over your export preferences. No more manual adjustments—let AI handle the complexity! ✨
plugins.tagline: Transform Figma frames into clean JSON with one click your design-to-development bridge made simple!

plugins.name: TDS - Persian Component Configuration Mapping
plugins.description:
Persian Converter for Alt Names

Effortlessly create component mapping for bilingual designers text in components with Persian support!


What it does

This plugin automatically converts Component configurations following "Alt. name:" lines to Persian script while preserving your original content. Perfect for designers working with multilingual interfaces or Persian localization.


Key Features


Smart Conversion

Transliterates English letters → Persian script using Persian-Standard keyboard mappings.

Converts digits → Persian numerals (۰۱۲۳)

Preserves non-Persian symbols/punctuation


Clean Workflow

  1. Purge Existing Persian - Removes all prior Persian characters/numbers from "Alt. name:" lines
  2. Convert - Transforms English characters to Persian equivalents
  3. Append - Adds converted text below original with proper spacing


Ideal For

Persian interface localization

Bilingual design systems

Teams collaborating across Latin/Persian script workflows

Maintaining clean alt-text alternatives in components

Design System Managers


Why Design System Managers will Love It:

No manual copy-pasting between lines

Prevents script mixing errors

Case-insensitive matching ("ALT. NAME:", "alt name :", etc.)

Multi-Format Support (Plain text nodes, Markdown-enabled descriptions)


-----


Coded with AI and ZERO coding knowledge :)
plugins.tagline: Maps component configuration from english keyboard to Standart persian keyboard

plugins.name: RAO - Compliance Checker
plugins.description:
In a few clicks, checks Figma designs for regulatory compliance across global financial regulators:

  1. FCA (UK 🇬🇧)
  2. ESMA (EU 🇪🇺)
  3. SEC (USA 🇺🇸)
  4. FDIC (USA 🇺🇸)
  5. OCC (USA 🇺🇸)
  6. AMF (FR 🇫🇷)
  7. SEBI (India 🇮🇳)
  8. BaFin (Germany 🇩🇪)
  9. SCA (UAE 🇦🇪)
  10. BCB (Brazil 🇧🇷)
  11. MAS (SG 🇸🇬)
  12. FINMA (Switzerland 🇨🇭)
  13. CNBV (Mexico 🇲🇽)
  14. MFSA (Malta 🇲🇹)
  15. CySEC (Cyprus 🇨🇾)


How to Use

1. Select the Figma frame or element you want to check

2. Choose your target regulator

3. Click "Review Designs"

4. Easy to action compliance recommendations in seconds!


Features

  1. Specific product design feedback
  2. Detailed citation of relevant regulations
plugins.tagline: Global compliance at your fingertips

plugins.name: Margin Detective
plugins.description:
Say goodbye to inconsistencies and hello to perfectly aligned designs. With Margin Detective, you get a vigilant partner that scans your frames, checks margins and spacings, and ensures they align with your document variables. When something’s off, it offers smart corrections or swaps, keeping your design cohesive and professional.


Whether you’re fine-tuning layouts or auditing a massive project, Margin Detective empowers you to maintain flawless alignment, harmony, and consistency—all with the efficiency of a true design detective.


Design smarter. Stay consistent. Every pixel, every time.
plugins.tagline: Detect. Correct. Perfect your design.

plugins.name: Relayout Map Generator
plugins.description: Relayout Map Generator is a powerful Figma plugin that allows you to search, customize, and generate high-quality maps directly within your design workflow. Easily adjust zoom levels, dimensions, and add location markers. With support for OpenStreetMap and place suggestions, it's the perfect tool for creating location-based visuals, UI mockups, travel interfaces, and more—without ever leaving Figma.

plugins.name: Copy SVG to Webflow
plugins.description:
This plugin lets you copy an SVG from Figma and paste it directly into your Webflow page.


Options:

  1. Use currentColor for fills
  2. Use currentColor for strokes
  3. Pass custom classes to Webflow (in 'class' attribute)
  4. Set Width and Height to 100%
  5. Set preserveAspectRatio


Enjoy!
plugins.tagline: Copy SVGs from Figma to Webflow with Classes

124623.name: Copy SVG to Webflow
124623.description:
This plugin lets you copy an SVG from Figma and paste it directly into your Webflow page.


Options:

  1. Use currentColor for fills
  2. Use currentColor for strokes
  3. Pass custom classes to Webflow (in 'class' attribute)
  4. Set Width and Height to 100%
  5. Set preserveAspectRatio


Enjoy!
124623.release_notes: Added option to set preserveAspectRatio, changed adding of classes to 'class' attribute to prevent duplicate class names, added the ability to set height and width to 100%
124623.tagline: Copy SVGs from Figma to Webflow with Classes

plugins.name: Text Paster
plugins.description:
What it does

This plugin allows you to:

  1. Select text layers from a selection
  2. Copy text strings from multiple text layers
  3. Paste text strings into multiple text layers in batch
  4. Sort text strings


How to use it

Transfer texts between frame

  1. Select a frame that contain text layers
  2. Click Copy in the plugin
  3. Select another frame that contain text layers you want to transfer the texts to
  4. Click Paste in the plugin


Transfer text from Spreadsheet

  1. Copy text from a spreadsheet (Google Sheets, Excel, etc.) or any line-break-separated text.
  2. Paste it into the text box in plugin
  3. Select a frame that contain text layers you want to paste the texts to
  4. Click Paste in the plugin


Delete hidden layers

  1. Select a frame
  2. Click Select "Hidden layer" (from dropdown menu)
  3. Press Delete key to delete hidden layers


-------

Kudos to AI — This plugin is the result of vibe coding with Cursor and GitHub Copilot. All the features were built just to scratch my own itches.
plugins.tagline: Trasfer text in batch with copy and paste

131151.name: Text Paster
131151.description:
What it does

Transfer text from Spreadsheet

-------

Kudos to AI — This plugin is the result of vibe coding with Cursor and GitHub Copilot. All the features were built just to scratch my own itches.
131151.release_notes:
- Fixed the issues that Copy and Paste buttons cannot handle directly selected text layers (previously can only select from frames)
- Improve progress bar perceived performance issue by reducing progress bar update frequency. Update progress UI every 1000 layers (previous 100). It sacrifices progress bar accuracy for better peformance
131151.tagline: Trasfer text in batch with copy and paste

plugins.name: AI Real Data Generator
plugins.description:
Description

Testing with real-life data is crucial, but setting up prototypes manually is time-consuming. With AI Real Data Generator Figma plugin, simply provide AI with your instructions and an example—using your Gemini API key, it will instantly generate and replace data in your design, making prototyping seamless and efficient.


How to Use:

  1. Add the AI Real Data Generator plugin in Figma.
  2. Enter your Gemini API key to enable data generation.
  3. Provide instructions on the type of real-life data you need.
  4. Provide an example or data template to guide AI generation.
  5. AI instantly generates and replaces data directly in your Figma design.


Key Features:


  1. Instant data generation: AI quickly fills in real-world data in seconds.
  2. Customizable: Provide specific instructions and examples to match your needs.
  3. Seamless integration: Data replaces existing placeholders in your design automatically.
  4. Efficiency boost: Save time on manual data entry during prototyping.
  5. Powered by Gemini API: Leverage advanced AI for precise data generation, enabled with the free gemini-2.0-flash modal
plugins.tagline: Instantly fill your Figma designs with real-world data using AI-powered precision

123418.tagline: Instantly fill your Figma designs with real-world data using AI-powered precision

plugins.name: Absurd Ipsum
plugins.description:
Embrace the Absurdity in Your Design!

Fill the void with chaotic, hilarious placeholder text—because why settle for boring when you can have weird?


Absurd Ipsum does exactly what it says—generate random paragraphs, usernames, quotes, error messages, and headings for your designs.


Preview the madness, copy the text to your clipboard, and unleash it wherever you like!


Enjoy the randomness—maybe you'll laugh, or at least wonder if your coffee mug is plotting against you.
plugins.tagline: Just like Lorem Ipsum but with a pinch of absurdity for your designs.

plugins.name: Schemator
plugins.description:
Schemator provides a flexible schema for your components helping you build code connect and write further tooling on it.


  1. Consistent Naming - Establish a universal schema for component properties, promoting seamless collaboration and code integration across teams and projects.
  2. Predictable Structure - Adopt a familiar and logical naming convention, ensuring that components are intuitive to use and easy to extend.
  3. Sanitized Definitions - Enable customization by adding suffixes and prefixes to property definitions, giving developers the flexibility to tailor components to their specific workflows.


Schemator is full open sourced, feel free to make changes to the rules and logic as you like 😀
plugins.tagline: Strucutre schema of your Figma components

Schemator is full open sourced, feel free to make changes to the rules and logic as you like 😀
113891.tagline: Strucutre schema of your Figma components

plugins.name: .dot
plugins.description:
.dot is a design command line tool that integrates with Figma, transforming the quick actions menu into a powerful command line interface. With .dot, designers can seamlessly access Tailwind functions, apply colors, and perform a wide range of tasks with speed and efficiency—bringing coding-like control to Figma's design environment.


Example Usage:

  1. It's easy, With a frame select type Cmd + P and .
  2. Choose the .dot plugin
  3. Type 'flex p-8 rounded-md bg-zinc-500' to create a styled container

accepted.name: Matthew Ortega
accepted.description:
A studio exploring technology to invent new forms of art & design

Figma training & design systems @ Fabric Co.

plugins.tagline: Supercharge Figma with Tailwind and custom commands at your fingertips.

plugins.name: Blink Notes
plugins.description:

With Blink Notes, you can:

Designed for speed, collaboration, and creativity, BlinkNotes helps you streamline your design process and never lose an idea again.


Add Blink Notes to your workflow and start designing smarter today.

plugins.name: Accessibility Checker
plugins.description:
Make your designs accessible to everyone with this comprehensive accessibility checker. This plugin combines automated testing with guided manual review to ensure your designs meet accessibility standards.


🔍 AUTOMATED CHECKS

- Text contrast analysis against backgrounds

- Font size verification for readability

- Overlapping elements detection

- Missing alt text detection


✅ INTERACTIVE CHECKLIST

Track your progress with a persistent checklist covering key accessibility criteria:

- Contrast and readability

- Color usage and clarity

- Image descriptions and alt text

- Language simplicity

- Animation limits

- Overall design clarity


💡 EDUCATIONAL RESOURCES

Each accessibility issue includes a direct link to relevant WCAG guidelines and best practices to help you learn while you design.


Perfect for designers who want to create more inclusive products and ensure compliance with accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1). This plugin makes accessibility checking a seamless part of your design workflow rather than an afterthought.


Whether you're new to accessibility or an experienced designer, this tool helps you identify and fix issues early in the design process, saving development time and creating better experiences for all users.
plugins.tagline: Create accessible designs with automated checks and guided review

122490.name: Accessibility Checker
122490.description:

💡 EDUCATIONAL RESOURCES

plugins.name: Icon Resizer
plugins.description:
The Icon Resizer Plugin is a powerful tool designed for designers who need to resize and create multiple versions of icons quickly and efficiently. Whether you’re working on UI/UX design, branding, or graphic design, the plugin helps streamline the process of resizing icons into various sizes while maintaining design integrity.

The plugin allows users to duplicate and resize selected icons to predefined sizes (e.g., 16px, 24px, 32px, 40px, 48px) with just a few clicks. You can choose a single size or add up to five different sizes in one go.
plugins.tagline: Resize, Reimagine, and Revitalize Your Icons in a Snap!

118276.name: Icon Resizer
118276.description:
The Icon Resizer Plugin is a powerful tool designed for designers who need to resize and create multiple versions of icons quickly and efficiently. Whether you’re working on UI/UX design, branding, or graphic design, the plugin helps streamline the process of resizing icons into various sizes while maintaining design integrity.

The plugin allows users to duplicate and resize selected icons to predefined sizes (e.g., 16px, 24px, 32px, 40px, 48px) with just a few clicks. You can choose a single size or add up to five different sizes in one go.
118276.tagline: Resize, Reimagine, and Revitalize Your Icons in a Snap!

plugins.name: TXT to Artboard
plugins.description:
TXT to Artboard allows you to quickly generate multiple artboards by entering their name, width, and height in a simple text format.


This plugin is perfect for setting up design systems, responsive layouts, or multi-screen projects with different screen sizes.


Just input the details, and the plugin will automatically create and arrange the artboards on your canvas. Save time and stay organized with this essential design tool.


Examples

og-contact,1200,630

ig/story-recruiting,1080,1920

ig/post-recruiting,1080,1080
plugins.tagline: Create multiple artboards from text input in seconds.

plugins.name: VV-Text
plugins.description:
海外项目设计师看过来！

使用对照表翻译设计稿时，是不是只能反复的复制粘贴？

现在只需两步轻松搞定，快来试试吧！


第一步：一键导出原文

（导出的CSV文件交给专业的翻译人员进行翻译）

第二步：一键导入翻译


轻松设计，轻松摸鱼 ^_^


-------------------------------------------------------------------------


Attention, overseas project designers!

When translating design drafts using a comparison table, do you have to rely on repeated copying and pasting?

Now it can be easily done in just two steps. Come and give it a try!


Step 1: One-click export of original text.


(The exported CSV file is handed over to professional translators for translation.)


Step 2: One-click import of translation.

plugins.name: Showcase
plugins.description:
Showcase makes presenting specific frames to your team effortless. Whether you’re walking through a design or highlighting a particular frame, Showcase lets you do so directly within the canvas, offering smooth flyover animations for a seamless presentation. Independent of the zoom level, you have full control over how close or far you view your frames—adjust zoom as desired.


Showcase is also helpful when working with large files that contain many frames. If you ever feel lost in the canvas, Showcase helps you quickly focus on a specific frame by simply selecting it from the layers panel.


Showcase is free to use. If you find it helpful, consider supporting the project by buying me a coffee ☕️.

accepted.name: Saleh KAYYALI
accepted.description: Hey 👋🏼  I'm an interaction designer with a passion for nifty productivity tools.

plugins.tagline: Present your Figma frames effortlessly.

plugins.name: Lindi for Tawakkalna
plugins.description:
Lindi revolutionizes the way UI/UX designs are created by leveraging advanced artificial intelligence to automate and enhance the design process. Users can rapidly prototype, iterate, and finalize visually appealing and user-friendly UI/UX designs.


This plugin is solely made for Tawakkalna Services allowing entities to build flows and designs with Tawakkalna's Design System rules.


The Plugin generates and transfers ready made designs from Lindi - The AI Designer to Figma allowing designers to view, create, and modify the contents of the files in Figma.
plugins.tagline: Design Smarter, Build Faster: Empowering UI/UX with AI precision.

118427.description:
Lindi revolutionizes the way UI/UX designs are created by leveraging advanced artificial intelligence to automate and enhance the design process. Users can rapidly prototype, iterate, and finalize visually appealing and user-friendly UI/UX designs.

plugins.name: tokenXtractor - by techworks studio
plugins.description:
tokenXtractor is a Figma plugin thoughtfully crafted to make exporting local variables, or tokens, easy and accessible. Its usage is fairly straightforward: configure your options, select your collections, and then download them.


1) Configure your options


  1. Case Style
  2. Export Single File
  3. Export Format


2) Select your collections


All collections are selected by default, so if you would like to export all your collections, you can skip this step. Otherwise, click on the variable collection name to select / deselect it for export.You can select multiple using CMD + Click (MacOS) or CTRL + Click (Windows). To select a range, click the first collection and then SHIFT + Click the last collection.You can undo your selection by clicking the 'RESET' button next to 'Collections?'


3) Download your tokens


Finally, press the 'DOWNLOAD TOKENS' button, save the zip file where you'd like, and then unzip the file to access your exported tokens.


Previewing + Misc. Tips


The right half of the plugin contains a 'preview' of the tokens to be exported. When exporting multiple files, you can use the dropdown menu next to 'Previewing' to switch the collection you're viewing.


------------------------------

Brought to you by techworks.studio

------------------------------
plugins.tagline: Export local variables to code-ready files

113188.name: tokenXtractor - by techworks studio

Otherwise, click on the variable collection name to select / deselect it for export.You can select multiple using CMD + Click (MacOS) or CTRL + Click (Windows). To select a range, click the first collection and then SHIFT + Click the last collection.You can undo your selection by clicking the 'RESET' button next to 'Collections?'


3) Download your tokens

Brought to you by techworks.studio

plugins.name: Mailman for Klaviyo
plugins.description:
Streamline your email design workflow by seamlessly exporting Figma designs to Klaviyo. Perfect for agencies and brands managing multiple Klaviyo accounts. Key features:


  1. Direct export from Figma to Klaviyo with preserved design fidelity
  2. Support for multiple Klaviyo account management
  3. Save and reuse HTML templates and blocks
  4. Time-saving workflow for agencies and marketing teams


Whether you're an agency handling multiple client accounts or a brand maintaining email templates, this plugin bridges the gap between Figma design and Klaviyo implementation. Save time on manual exports and focus on creating emails.

126506.name: Mailman for Klaviyo
126506.description:
Streamline your email design workflow by seamlessly exporting Figma designs to Klaviyo. Perfect for agencies and brands managing multiple Klaviyo accounts. Key features:


  1. Direct export from Figma to Klaviyo with preserved design fidelity
  2. Support for multiple Klaviyo account management
  3. Save and reuse HTML templates and blocks
  4. Time-saving workflow for agencies and marketing teams


Whether you're an agency handling multiple client accounts or a brand maintaining email templates, this plugin bridges the gap between Figma design and Klaviyo implementation. Save time on manual exports and focus on creating emails.
126506.tagline: Export Figma email designs directly to Klaviyo

plugins.name: FigPipe
plugins.description:
Introducing FigPipe [beta] - our streamlined Figma plugin for effortless asset management!


With just a few clicks, seamlessly upload your selected elements directly to your preferred CDN. Simply set up your CDN provider, choose your asset, select the destination, and click upload. Access your assets instantly with links generated straight to your CDN.


Simplify your workflow and accelerate your development process today! 🚀


Currently supports only UploadCare❗️


Your feedback is invaluable!
plugins.tagline: Figma Assets Straight to Your CDN!

plugins.name: Kaiju Asset Delivery
plugins.description: Deliver your design tokens or icon assets as a pull request straight to your Github repos. We transform tokens or icons for the destination framework i.e. Android Compose or iOS SwiftUI.

plugins.name: ICONCINO - Free icons
plugins.description:
These icons were designed by Gabriele Malaspina and are released under the CC0 1.0 license.


You can use them freely for personal and commercial projects, with no attribution required.


Modify them, remix them, use them in client work or side projects — no strings attached.


All icons are available in a single Figma file to make browsing and copying super easy (using the file you can customize the corner radii).


If you find them useful and want to say thanks, you can buy me a coffee ☕ — totally optional, but always appreciated!

accepted.name: Gabriele Malaspina
accepted.description: Digital product designer ❖ Figma educator ❖ Coordinator of the UI Design Course by Politecnico di Milano ❖ Design systems enthusiast ❖ Accessibility advocate

plugins.tagline: Add icons from the ICONCINO set

plugins.name: Simple Organizer
plugins.description:
Tired of messy Figma files?

Simple Organizer helps you create a clean and structured workspace instantly with a predefined folder system. Just run the plugin, and your project will be organized in seconds!


How It Works:

  1. Run the Simple Organizer plugin
  2. Instantly generate a structured file system
  3. Focus on designing—without the clutter


Pre-built Folder Structure:

✅ Cover – Keep your project visually organized

✅ About – Store key project info

✅ Research – Benchmarking, presentations, and data

✅ Wireframes – Name and version your iterations

✅ Design – Final designs in one place

✅ Writing – Dedicated space for content

✅ Accessibility – Specs for an inclusive experience

✅ Components – Local and system components

accepted.name: Julio Cacko
accepted.description: I'm a seasoned UX/UI design with a 7+ year track record of crafting user-centric experiences that drive engagement and business value. My passion lies in making

plugins.tagline: Structure your Figma files in one Click!

plugins.name: Variable JSON
plugins.description:
"Variable JSON – Seamlessly Export Figma Variables to JSON"


Quickly convert your Figma variables into clean JSON with Variable JSON. Select your Collection, Group, and Mode, generate the JSON, and copy it instantly—perfect for streamlining design-to-development workflows.


How to Use:

  1. Open Variable JSON: In Figma, go to Plugins > Variable JSON.
  2. Select Variables: Choose the Collection, Group, and Mode (e.g., Light, Dark, or Custom).
  3. Generate JSON: Click "GEN JSON" to create the JSON output based on your selection.
  4. Copy JSON: Click copy button and use it in your projects.


Effortless variable exporting starts here! 🚀
